title: Hàng Xóm Tôi Là Totoro - Tonari No Totoro
lyrics: To to ro to toro to to ro to toro Dareka ga kossor i Komichi ni ko no mi u zumete Chiisana me haeta ra himitsu no an mgo Mori e no pasupoo to Sutekina bouken hajima ru Tonari no to to ro to toro to to ro to toro Mori no naka ni mu kashi kara sunde ru Tonari no to to ro to toro to to ro to toro Kodomo no toki ni dake a nata ni otozure ru Fushigina dea i Ame f uri basu tei Zubunure obake ga itara Anata no amagas a sashite agema msho Mori e no pasupoo to Mahou no tobira akima su Tonari no to to ro to toro to to ro to toro Tsukiyo no ban ni okarina fuite ru Tonari no to to ro to toro to to ro to toro Moshimo aeta nara su tekina shiawase ga Anata ni kuru wa
